Desc.entry: A registered charity which aims to improve the quality of life of older people who may have become isolated from friends and neighbours due to ill health or mobility problems. Offers a gentle exercise group, an information service, a telephone support service, coffee mornings, lunch clubs and outings to surrounding areas for people in the Castle Ward area. Befriending service and information service free of charge. Transport provided. Self or any referral.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Every other Friday (lunch clubs), please contact for further details

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Induction loop only in Community hall, level floor access throughout, Braille signage, car parking, free hire of mobility scooter - book in advance on Tel 286 0400

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Wednesdays (lunch club, please contact for details), for other meetings see newsletter or contact for details
